description.value:
Your observation skills have been honed, enhancing your perception and range.

When you make a ranged Strike while in Basic Touch stance, you lower the DC of your flat check to target a creature that's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you. The DC is reduced to @Check[flat|dc:3]{3} instead of 5 against a concealed creature and to @Check[flat|dc:9]{9} instead of 11 against a hidden one.

Once per minute, when you make a ranged Strike and target a hidden creature, you don't have to attempt the flat check for targeting a hidden creature with a ranged Strike.
